update plus face gain update http imgur com gallery wroscxf journey so far i started keto on 12 2019 i wa 326 lb and noticed my quality of life wa poor i went to a dr who doe medically supervised weight loss and i knew if i followed his instruction i would have success i already knew lot about it but he taught me all about the keto diet and told me to follow the carb protein fat number he set for me and gave me basically a large faq folder to take with me for the first couple month i saw him every two week with weigh in that provided a printout of my progress with nifty little graph and all we would talk about what kind of thing i wa eating how i wa feeling etc and would be a coach counselor cheerleader once i wa adapted to the lifestyle we moved to 3 week between appointment i looked forward to my time with him and tried to avoid weighing myself outside of his office so it felt like a treat to see my new number once i had lost a good amount of weight and my energy wa high he got me to start working out i got a gym membership and wa going 3 4 day a week i loved my gym day and wa shocked that it had taken me so long to go everything wa going perfect then covid i wa actually at the gym when i got the text that they would be closing indefinitely in a few hour no biggie i went to the store on my way home to buy resistance band medicine ball among other thing to work out in my garage i got everything set up and never used it once going to my garage to work out didn t have the same feel of going to the gym and i just couldn t do it it s ok though i ll just stick to the diet by this time no in person dr appointment allowed so i could no longer weigh in and get my cool graph i tried zoom style appointment but it wasn t the same i kept eating keto and on april 30 2020 i wa 262 lb 64 pound lost in le than 5 month incredible well that wa the lowest number i would see on the scale i slowly started cheating here and there mostly for comfort in this crazy new world we were in before long i wa 100 off keto for a long time i stayed pretty close to my lowest weight i had learned about portion control only eating when i needed to and stopping when my body told me to eventually i fell back into over eating eating for fun and comfort and to satiate boredom pound started rising and me new clothes got tight i didn t step on a scale for a long time 1 1 2021 i stepped on a scale 312 i wa so upset and disappointed i promised myself i would never go back to where i started the next morning i wa 100 keto i dropped down to 295 quick and stayed there for about 3 week what wa i doing wrong i soon realized i wa using all the keto low carb product from the grocery store i cut those all out and went back to basic meat cheese egg avocado cauliflower brussels sprout that s it only thing i will put in my body today i am 272 and 10 lb away from my first goal of getting back to where i wa a year ago i am hoping to hit my goal of 262 by april 30 the date i hit 262 last year i just want to end by saying thank you to everyone who share their story here i read them often and you all give me ton of motivation sorry for the long post but it s been a long journey so far have a great day and thanks for listening

nsv korean edition okay quickest backstory obese my whole adult life in 2014 2016 i had lost 60lbs 27kg with keto you can see in my post history how well i had done once moved to korea in 2016 gained everything back plus a little more and hypothyroidism anyway since march 2020 i started fixing my habit again i ve been keto since november 2020 a of today i ve lost 63lbs 28 5kg i m 7lbs away from getting back to my low weight a few year ago but still have much more to lose from there but the nsv is something i could only feel in korea korean are quite truthful lol when it come to weight sometimes brutally honest they are also just generally thinner and there s a high expectation for appearance here so being obese in a country like korea ha been extra rough on my self esteem but i m working through that don t worry i m still at least 54lbs 24 4kg away from a healthy weight so i didn t expect comment for a while but good lord at least i m feeling amazing again finally i catch the bus to work in the morning and always wait with a middle aged woman who life near me i m talking over 4 year of u waiting together she doesn t speak english and i speak kindergarten korean at best i understand more than i can say but we always manage to have little chat she take care of me like picking cat hair off my shirt holding an umbrella over me etc it s a cute relationship we have this week she asks me always in korean if i ve lost weight i wa shocked she noticed and said something i told her how much explained no carbs and no exercise yet haha she wa amazed today a few day later she said again how pretty i look and then tell me she didn t eat carbs for dinner this week and she is happy she s no longer bloated i inspired my middle aged korean bus auntie then tonight i pop into my local convenience store the woman who work there ha witnessed first hand my absolutely horrendously trash diet for year carbs microwave meal crisp bottle of wine i don t go in a often anymore because i cook at home and don t drink right now but i needed paper towel again she doe not speak english and i do not speak nearly enough korean but she asks me if i ve lost weight and again i tell her how much and that i eat keto and she s amazed and so kind and complimentary i know i m still obese i stand out a a foreigner anyway never mind being overweight but like my korean neighbour are noticing and are proud of me despite the language barrier they are making effort to comment none of my korean co worker have commented yet i m curious when or if haha also bonus nsv i just want to different way of tracking i recently recommitted to keto after a hiatus sparked by the holiday and which ha dragged on a few month longer than i planned i decided to do something differently with my tracking this around i wa using fitness tracker which wa fine but the problem i had wa that i would eat something that seemed keto and then track it sometimes not until the end of the day or even the following morning even when i thought i wa in good shape for the day i often found myself in the 30 40 gm territory from sneaky carb content meal planning would help address this but i am someone who really ha a hard time eating thing i m not on the mood for and i tend to graze out of the fridge for most of my meal i only really cook proper meal on the weekend otherwise it s just throwing together a plate of meat cheese and whatever else look good my solution is to compile a spreadsheet of the keto food i like best and eat most i captured their net carbs per my typical serving i categorized them by general type and in order of what i should be eating protein veg seed nut fat condiment fruit then i sorted the content with in each category from most to least net carbs per my typical serving because it s on my computer screen it s easy to track throughout the day and then i can easily see what my balance of net carbs is and then look at my option by scanning the top and middle of each category when i m running low on carbs by keeping protein at the top i m channeling my snacking on that direction since i can scan the list until something look good starting with protein versus scanning my fridge and starting with cheese or hot dog i m still tracking macro and calorie this just offer a way for me to narrow my choice within the band they should be in

circuit dieting with keto any merit to this phenomenon 2 week in ketosis 1 week just slightly out of it amp repeat so i have done keto a couple of time for weight loss now amp it usually start off fast with the weight loss amp then slows down a lot a few week in with zero change in diet i ve gotten stuck like this a few time before amp there wa a few time in the past where i took a short few day to week long break from ketosis for example most recently i took a break to partake in a small slice of birthday cake the very next day down a pound repeat down another pound after a few day up to a week this effect level off and then the weight loss sits stagnant so start up ketosis again amp the weight loss is back to normal again then a couple week later and the weight loss slows down again i ve noticed this phenomenon a few time now amp i ve chalked it up to comparing it to the enhanced effect of circuit training exercise in which you have short period of altering level of intense exercise to reap benefit exceeding that of a regular consistent pace for the same time so ha anyone else here ever read about it experienced this effect of circuit dieting in the ketogenic diet seems like it work but i d like to see some confirmation

three week in hey all amp x200b i'm about three week into keto and i'm just really grateful for not only the diet itself but also the great information i've gleaned by lurking around this sub amp x200b utilizing essentially a form of dirty keto and 16 8 if i've been able to break down my almost nightly acid reflux to 0 one occurrence in the last three week tone down my junk food craving and get to a point where i almost forget to eat during the day and while i don't personally look all that much different the scale informs me that i've dropped 16 since starting amp x200b a few observation i don't know if it's the keto or the if or both but they do something magical to my craving very little if any junk carb craving i haven't broken my occasional need for an energy drink in the morning but it's definitely lessened and when i need one i reach for a red bull zero or a rockstar total zero fallen in love with chicken thigh batch cook them in the instant pot shred them and store them in the fridge for a cheese wrap salad or just heated in a bowl with frank red hot there's still an occasional sweet tooth calling me and i've discovered the absolute best alternative atkins peanut butter cup 3g net carbs and they're a delicious a reeses cheese cheese cheese cheese amp x200b so thank you all again and i can't wait to share another update in the future

nearing the end of month 2 sw 223 cw 203 gw 180 h 5 3 f18 when first start i wa totally lost i didn t know what most of the letter and number above meant after a while it became apparent i made an account specifically for this subreddit i had stalked it for about a month before giving it a try the current goal weight is only my first goal i will be setting new goal after reaching those making realistic goal for myself first the first month i lost 16 pound i started at the beginning of february i wa absolutely shocked by how much better i felt within that first month no more bloating more mental clarity overall i became le socially anxious and never a tired a i used to be not to mention the reduced appetite and overall confidence boost that it gave me determination no more of my reckless binge eating during march i hit a miniature stall i lost another pound or so in the beginning of march the scale wasn t budging at all after that it went on for about 3 week not enough to be called an official stall it wasn t until this last week that the scale started to budge again even though it only budged a pound it felt like a huge victory after it refusing not to budge for almost an entire month i know i know the inch matter too although i don t really have anything to measure inch but during march i also noticed my endurance had increase a some of you might have seen from my recent nv evil hill post even though i have only lost 4 pound this month even the small victory add up who know there is still 2 more day to go in march but i am 4 pound away from onederland been almost 2 year since i had last been in onederland if anyone need a push to start or get back on well here it is small victory count and they sure do add up over time also on a little side note ha anyone else like when they look at high carb food they used to love they just don t look a appetizing anymore kcko

read those nutrition ingredient label for sneaky carbs so i bought a bag of pork rind the other day so i could have an easy snack while working it wa an impulse purchase a i wa checking out at the store so i didn't read the ingredient list a thoroughly a i typically would later that day a i wa munching on the pork rind and nearing the end of the bag i noticed the crumb at the bottom had a distinctly sweet taste hm weird the bag said zero carb but i know the taste of sugar when it hit my taste bud so i flip the bag over and check the nutritional info it indeed list the carb count a 0 okay let's take a look at the ingredient then and there we have it listed a the second ingredient is coconut palm sugar is this a huge deal well it could be for some people depending on their daily allotment of total carb intake but it might be just fine for others my whole point is just to be mindful of what's really in those product we consider safe or keto friendly be aware that even though the front of a package claim the item is zero carb there still might be undesirable ingredient in the product btw the brand wa 4505 and the flavor wa classic

i couldn t make progress on keto until i stopped trying to make progress on keto story and photo after giving birth to our son last july i knew i needed to lose weight but i wa afraid to i had tried and failed so many time i simply did not have it in me to go through the anxiety impatience self criticism hopelessness and defeat once again so i decided i would wait until i wa emotionally ready to lose weight thanks to this sub i wa already mentally prepared and knew what i needed to do once i wa ready to commit for me emotional readiness meant learning to be grateful for my body it had carried two beautiful baby one who weighed 10 13 lb at birth and wa strong despite year of stress and stress eating i also had to stop seeing my diet a a punishment for getting fat and instead start seeing weight loss a a gift that i wanted to give my body for everything it ha done for me and finally i had to let go of the belief that i had to do keto perfectly and that if i didn t i wa doomed to failure and would just wind up quitting again when i restarted keto on february 9 i weighed myself but i did not take any picture i did not track my macro or log my food because tracking these thing ha always caused me to question whether i wa optimizing my effort i simply ate low carb to no carb food mostly meat cheese egg butter and veggie i took a before picture a few day later but only from the front and back and then a few week after that i took some side picture after seeing someone in this group say how helpful it wa to her i am now 7 week in i still don t track anything although i weigh myself every few day because the number no longer cause analysis paralysis i ve lost 20 pound and still have another 40 pound to go before i will be at a comfortable healthy bmi i would like to try if at some point but i m letting myself settle into this new normal for a little while longer and even though the judgmental voice inside my head is telling me not to post this i let fear and shame tell me how to feel about my body for decade also i have learned so much from this sub and have been inspired by so many people here i thought i would share my story for anyone else who may be afraid to try again http imgur com a kofivzo

update how the hell am i supposed to eat keto with a non keto family hi everyone a couple week ago i posted asking for help because i cook for my family and i wasn t sure if keto would be feasible cooking for both myself and my family you can see my last post here http www reddit com r keto comment m0enfy how_the_hell_am_i_supposed_to_eat_keto_with_a_non i knew i desperately needed to lost weight but didn t realize how much until i took progress pic and saw the amount of back fat i have i decided to do keto the week my sibling would not be with me to have a head start it wa difficult at first but i eventually got the hang of thing i should add that this is not my first round of keto i tried it a couple year ago and i did lose weight but i didn t stick with it a true test of this diet would come this past monday when my sibling came to stay with me for the week the food that we usually eat is filled with carbs from rice sugar bread etc we mainly eat caribbean food which are filled with carbs i am writing this to encourage anyone in a situation like mine it is possible to eat keto and cook for your family at the same time yeah it take more work but it s worth it you also have to be creative here s what a couple meal this week looked like monday jerk salmon asparagus and baked potato ditch the potato wednesday chicken kabob yogurt sauce broccoli and yellow rice replace yellow rice with yellow califlower rice friday chipotle saturday homemade burger fry ice cream chip no bun burger ditch the fry rebel ice cream and quest chip sunday red bean and rice stew chicken baked mac and cheese carrot cake okay so i didn t have any of this can t even have stew chicken because the base of it is caramelized sugar i had a protein shake instead i wa planning to have a cobb salad but got too sidetracked to prepare it on sunday for breakfast i had bacon and egg in a low carb tortilla and coffee which kept me full the whole day and i only had a protein shake at 1 am before i went to sleep because i wa feeling peckish it s unbelievable how full this diet keep you side note doe anyone know of a sugar alcohol that caramelizes the same a sugar guy i didn t not cheat not once not with the rice bread carrot cake ice cream doritos aloo potato pie pancake english muffin mac and cheese and this is coming from someone with binge eating disorder i wanted piece of carrot cake so bad i like to bake but i stayed strong i saw some carrot cake fat bomb i d like to try tho anyway sorry for the long post just wanted to share my experience with someone in the same boat a me maybe i ll make more update post in the future with picture measurement and benefit

eating green everyday is essential to loosing weight on keto for me personally anyways i've heard friend and people on here say that the reason that they think they start to stall on keto is because of them eating keto desert i thought the same too we were keeping it under 20 carbs everyday so what wa wrong then i tried something that i wa avoiding i started loosing weight immediately were you still eating your green i found out that for me personally it wasn't so much of the rebel ice cream and general keto stuff everyday that wa messing up my progress i learned that a soon a i added green veggie into my diet everyday i started losing weight again immediately but i still eat the ice cream atkins and everything keto related like that i do this pretty much everyday like now i eat 2 3 small bag of those quest chip 4 net carbs each i know but they are so good two peanut butter cup 2 net carbs two cheesy hot dog wrapped in keto bread or one split keto tortilla 2 for bread or 5 carbs for tortilla and a full can of green bean with butter and salt and pepper i dont generally count these carbs especially if i'm under 20 by that point i lose a 8 to a pound every 2 day i'll also switch the desert out with whatever i have at the time like pecan ice cream ugh yes i now keep my carbs pretty loose if i go over 20 it usually just 23 and the rest is filled with the green bean 7 idk if this will work for everyone because you might already be incorporating green everyday and there might be another seemingly inexplicable reason why your stalling but i do hope that this will reach another me out there who think that eating meat and cheese and everything else just to avoid green is the move because it isn't i learned that the hard way lol unless you're making it work then heck yeah

time to get my life in order hey everyone i'm m46 having struggled for the vast majority of my life with my weight going up to 330lbs at my peak in my late 20 yo yo ing up and down stabilizing at about 275 for a few year until i decided about 15 year ago to go through bariatric surgery and get a lap band that helped me out for a while bringing my weight down to about 225 but i wa building a ton of muscle at that point going to the gym 5 day a week for a mix of light cardio and strength and then of course life got in the way i work in tech which meant long hour grabbing whatever i could eat and thing crept up over the last 20 year i've also been suffering from mild clinical depression nothing crazy but enough to add to the uggggggghh aspect of life and exercise and coming up with excuse not to do x y or z unsurprisingly thing were a lot better during my healthy period and my psychiatrist ha often recommended focusing on my weight loss to get better easier said than done especially when living in my head the challenge for me ha been trust and accountability i'm married with 2 kid and am the cook of the house my wife ha known me forever 40+ year and ha seen me through all of my phase i love her to death and i know she mean well but she can be very judgmental and over the year i've lost my ability to have a proper discussion around anything regarding my health or weight i just get incredibly defensive and change the subject i've also tried and somewhat successfully lost a decent chunk of weight a few year back i got into golfing after year of making fun of my parent and started ww at the time and dropped a good 25lbs in a few week but i would do all of this avoiding conversation with the family or even mentioning i wa doing it given i'm the cook in the house it didn't lead to good sustaining result this accountability problem didn't just lie with how i interacted with my family heck my feeling of repeated failure kept pushing me to delay visit to doctor for checkup and given my family ha a long history of diabetes and some heart disease it wa incredibly irresponsible i'm a walking heart attack waiting to happen i'd always push my reminder out a few month until i'd lose enough weight to have some good news to give my dr a she gave me the look of disappointment a few month back i realized that a year of quarantine killed what little exercise i wa getting at work and my day consisted of 10 hour on my desk chair a few hour with the family and then a few hour watching tv or back to work my sleeping pattern were messed up because i'd choose to fall asleep on the couch setting my alarm for 5am to then go up to bed so my wife could get a really good night sleep without me snoring next to her no sleep apnea but boy i can be a trumpet my back is shot i can barely walk straight and am in constant pain i'm an 80 year old man in a 40something body the thought of the pandemic being over and the world going back to normal is both exciting but also agonizing no more excuse to do absolutely nothing while my depression ha always been fairly mild i've lost family member to suicide and would never ever every think of inflicting something like that on my own family and friend but hey if i died from a heart attack would that be so bad i felt like i hit rock bottom i know it sound dumb but it took all my courage to sit down with my wife and tell her that it wa time i wa seeking help and that while i knew she meant well i needed her to give me some room here i'd tried keto a few time for short period of time and it suit me well in general a i'm not really a carbs person anyhow but doing it in hiding is incredibly difficult i decided to bite the bullet and sign up to virta health buy a peloton and say screw it i'll be the guy who come in 100 thousandth on leaderboards for a while but i know i'll be better two thing that work with me accountability and gamification virta hold me accountable no hiding the coach is on you daily everything's measured it forced me to go to the dr and get result and i'm just incredibly lucky that despite all the abuse my body ha taken my blood sugar and cholesterol number are high but below any problematic number peloton once i get started gamifies thing i started on duolingo learning japanese a couple of year back for the fun of it and not only kept going regardless of what wa going on but made me decide to take formal lesson and go to japan all that because of that damn streak i know all of this is irrelevant to all of you but honestly r keto ha been an inspiration for the doctor wa impressed so about five week ago i went to the doctor and received my first official diagnosis of diabetes i had had problem having healthcare prior to now and wa able to get it in january after not having it for a long time but i suspected that wa the case for some time now after 5 week i went back for a follow up my a1c1 is down 2 entire point in only 5 week with keto 15 lb weight loss and metformin it's almost at normal range and is currently normal based on my blood glucose test the a1c1 will assuredly go down some more in a couple month after the metformin and keto have been doing their stuff in synergy my doctor wa impressed i have never seen a doctor be so perky and delighted he told me to keep up the good work and complimented me three or four time i wasn't even sure how to take that much praise lol he also said he thought i could reverse my diabetes get off of the metformin and should strive for that lucky break there getting the doctor who know this is possible and doesn't just treat it like it's a done deal i hope this story however simple help other people see how good this way of eating can be i know the doctor is right and i'm going to keep on fighting for my life and quality of life i knew diabetes wa bad but i didn't know some of the thing the doctor informed me about it's really easy to realize now that a lot of my health nag are from the diabetes i can do this and so can all of you if anyone need a support buddy i'm open to that i could probably use a few people to talk to too will happily trade non reddit messenger good luck and good day everyone

keto and thyroid ha anyone here had a problem with keto and thyroid i have hashimoto s thyroiditis for over 20 year now it s been very stable for the last 10 i ve lost 30+ pound on keto lately tho i wa getting really hungry and losing my control also struggling with horrible insomnia which made me of course completely exhausted during the day i wa thinking it wa perimenopause symptom then my hand started shaking i knew right away went and got lab work done and sure enough i m hyper that mean i m getting too much thyroid hormone this can cause insomnia heart racing hand shaking increased appetite lot of fun thing sometimes it take me a hot minute to figure out that it is a thyroid hormone fluctuation especially now because it s been so stable for so long once before i lost weight 100 pound on ww and my level went up a lot which seems counter intuitive you would think lost weight lower blood volume you would need le hormone nope needed more but sometimes this stupid disease is annoying like that but this time i wonder about the gf aspect of this diet i had a friend who wa diagnosed went gf and never had to go on med citing the inflammatory nature of gluten hence my curiosity of could the gf aspect of keto be affecting the function of my thyroid i can get an adjustment of medication and the insomnia and other symptom will dissipate i know this but i m curious if anyone else on here ha experienced this have thyroid disease done keto and had it affect you not eating gluten ha been really good for me in so many way i really don t want to go back to it

my keto journey how my quality of life ha improved after just 5 week sex female age 25 height 5ft 9 sw 204 lb cw 190 lb gw 150 lb old macro 16g carb 105g fat 85g protein 1357 kcal new macro 23g carb 68g fat 100g protein 1102 kcal intermittent fasting 16 8 first meal at 11 30am snack at 4pm second meal at 7pm hi everyone i'm just 5 week into my keto journey and swapped to my new macro just a few day ago so hopefully the weightloss improves i'm still very happy with 14lbs though i'm taking that a 10lbs water weight for the first week and then about 1lb per week thereafter which is right on target but weightloss aside i wanted to share how keto ha positively affected me to try and encourage others to stick it out even if their weightloss journey ha been a bit of a bumpy ride joint pain a a young person experiencing chronic severe joint pain in my finger and moderate pain in one of my knee for the past few year wa painful and frustrating before lockdown i went to trapeze and pole fitness class twice a week but fall on any of these area would result in pain that would take week to subside i wa told my symptom were typical of rheumatoid arthritis but i'd have to go in for further test to confirm this since swapping to keto my finger pain ha disappeared entirely and my knee pain is barely there i really believe in this diet for reducing inflammation spot acne in that same vein the skin on my face ha never been better whilst i only had mild acne on my cheek the overall quality of my skin wa poor with it being bumpy uneven and red in place the redness and spot have gone and i cannot believe that the uneven texture i had especially in place like my forehead where it's impossible to miss ha disappeared fat and water deposit the first major change i experienced when i lost the initial water weight wa the change in skin quality of my thigh i use to sit on the toilet and look down at my thigh and hate their appearance not quite cellulite but lumpy all the same the skin there ha now evened out and the lump are gone i wonder if this is where water wa being retained unevenly in place between the skin and fat bloating before keto i wa frequently bloated and had stomach pain due to 1 the food i wa eating and 2 a bad habit i had of swallowing air when i wa hungry despite still drinking the like of coke zero i haven't experience any bloating or pain whilst on keto and my better more fulfilling meal are helping with my air swallowing habit energy level i use to suffer from the post lunch slump and a i'm currently working from home would have to take a 2hr nap in the afternoon before returning to work when i wa working in the office this would of course be impossible so my productivity would just cease to exist and i'd be sat at my desk managing to do next to no work happy to say that i've shockingly not had a single nap since starting keto i'm able to go the entire day with my level of productivity being pretty consistent throughout brain fog likewise my brain fog ha gone i struggled focussing on task and wa frequently overwhelmed by large amount of data i create simulation for the oil and gas industry so handle a lot of number i feel like my mind is sharper now and i'm le likely to have my eye glaze over mood i suffer from stress and anxiety whether it's just down to making a positive impact in my life or whether it's the diet itself i can't remember the last time i felt this good i feel happy optimistic and like a metaphorical weight ha been lifted from me even before the phsyical weight ha gone for the first time in 7 year i'm starting to feel like i'm getting myself back sleep no more struggling to sleep i'm getting a good undisturbed night of sleep each night and have gone from being that person who hit the snooze button on their alarm clock a million time to waking up before my alarm relationship with food i hated food i wa a high carb snack eater because i hated preparing meal now i actually enjoy the process of researching what i'm going to make getting creative with recipe and then getting hand on with making it keto's restriction remove some of the overwhelming choice there is with food and working within those confines actually make it easier to come up with interesting dish hopefully some of my experience can act a motivation for others so thanks for letting me share

progress report have gone full keto combined with intermittence fasting for a little over a month down 30lbs sw 352 cw 322 a little back ground on me im a 37 male and have always been a heavy set guy but never had any health issue or performance issue and have maintained weight for the last 10 year between 305 and 315 lb during the pandemic i shot up to 352 my heaviest i have ever been and i really started to feel horrible my knee hurt my back hurt and i couldn't bend over to tie my shoe but the worst part wa that i could no longer enjoy sex like i used to not to mention that i could no longer see my own penis i wa horrified lol so that's when i decide it wa time for a change since then i have been doing a form of extreme keto were i only eat protein and limit carbs to only leafy green no starchy veggie like carrot or potato and only eat snack with le than 1g of carbs like pork rind i combined that with a 48hour water fast every other day and eat keto when i do eat so far i feel great i have more energy better concentration and i can finally see my penis again lol and im not stopping any time soon pic coming soon

not my first rodeo advanced lesson learned on keto round 2 hey all before i get started apology for the format of this i'm not super good at organizing my thought but i wanted to share my journey and the insight that have come to me along the way hopefully this is all decipherable to begin with i started my keto journey in late 2018 at a starting weight of 155 lb and a goal weight of 110 lb i am 32f 5'1 see picture in the imgur link at the bottom note from the picture 110 might be a little thin for me but my rationale wa that i might gain a lot of water weight and bounce back to 115 which i think is a maintainable weight that i would be really happy with so that's how i came to my goal over the course of the next year and change i lost a total of 39 pound getting to a low weight of 116 pound around january 2020 i took a 1 month keto break and went back up to 120 staying on the horse after this break wa difficult and ultimately i fell off entirely when the pandemic hit i ended up gaining 20 pound back to 140 well new year's came around and i resolved to get back to my original goal weight of 110 lb i wa pretty mad at myself that i let myself slip so much and let all that hard work go to waste so i set a really aggressive goal of 2 lb per week barring 1 or 2 bad week i have kept up with this so far it is now the end of week 11 and i have lost 17 lb i definitely noticed i have lost weight a lot faster this time around i don't believe it is because it's my second time but rather some key difference in the way i decided to approach keto the second time and i'd like to share these with you pre keto habit i wa a fairly gluttonous person with poor meal portion awareness control i just wanted to stuff my face all day everyday with my favorite food it wa the most amazing and soothing feeling in the world i lived for carbs pasta pizza and potato chip specifically i loathed exercise keto first round 2018 2019 philosophy aka thing not to do even though i lost 39 lb on it diet had always failed for me because i just wanted to always shove food in my mouth i think the reason keto initially worked for me wa because i figured out that a long a something had next to 0 carbs in it i could basically eat a much a i wanted and still lose weight this wa basically a miracle diet for me i made a list of food that i didn't want to go without found the one that had very very few carbs and just shoveled those thing into my face 24 7 in hindsight this wa really unhealthy but ultimately it got the ball rolling but the takeaway is keto initially worked for me because i wa able to continue feeding my glutton habit toward the end of 2019 i wa really beginning to crave carbs and would get sloppier and sloppier with takeout meal and cheat snack my rationale wa the more fat i eat the more carbs i can eat since really carb quota is based on percentage of total macro this led to more snowballing with the gluttony and i found myself eating massive amount of fat everyday to justify going up to 30 or 40 gram of carbs i'm not sure if this logic actually hold true for keto i didn't gain weight but i didn't lose weight either probably due to the sheer calorie in to calorie out ratio in the second half of 2019 i began to rely heavily on highly processed keto substitute what i call fake food product with wheat or milk protein isolate that mimicked puffy grain and cereal baked good such a cooky brownie and cake with fake sugar and almond coconut flour and substitute bread such a almond meal bread cloud bread and whatever voodoo magic thinslim's bread are made of at some point my diet consisted of 80 or more of these packaged keto substitute fake food and i wa barely even eating any veggie or meat once again my gluttonous tendency had taken over but this time i wa trying to just eat a much comforting processed easy to binge food a possible i didn't have an exit strategy my exit during january 2020 wa basically i miss carbs and i'm going to try to binge on them like crazy for a month to get the urge out of the way yeah right cadonana this wa dangerous self enabling excuse riddled talk i never thought ahead to what my regular diet might look like after i hit my goal weight or came off keto heaven know that the way i wa eating wa absolutely not healthy or sustainable despite the fact that i wa losing weight queue the pandemic welllllll old and constant friend gluttony let's see how we did absolutely just started eating my feeling and bingeing every processed comfort food in sight in mass quantity i'd run to the drug store in my ppe and clean out the kettle chip shelf once a week sometimes i'd sit in front of the tv and eat 2 bag of chip in one sitting rice ramen mac and cheese pizza oh my gosh i'm surprised i didn't get diabetes during the pandemic i wa also gluttonous in other way my retail therapy spending got out of control and i found my front door being piled with package of useless crap over the past year hello 2021 time for fresh start and healthier perspective well obviously something had had to change i had ballooned out to 140 lb again i wa no longer fitting the new wardrobe i had bought myself in 2019 my bank account wa drained i wa sleeping whenever possible just barely doing the thing i needed to it wa a pretty dark time for me i felt like crap physically and mentally january 1st came around and i resolved the next day i would stop shoveling mac and cheese into my piehole and start taking care of myself more here are the thing i did differently the second time around a mentioned before i wa pretty mad at myself and set an aggressive goal of 2 lb per week what really surprised me 3 month in is that i wa able to more or le stick to this so far i made a nifty chart see link below to track my progress and came up with some reward for myself i think this tracking chart actually helped my motivation immensely it's so satisfying when i hit a day where i can color in another block note that i also laminated the chart so i can erase progress in case i'm bad and gain weight again haha ironically my severe spending habit in 2020 helped me in a way in addition to starting up keto again i had put myself on a rather strict budget and saving goal for 2021 this helped me so much because i simply couldn't afford all those expensive pre packaged keto fake food that i had binged on so much in the year before i think the presence of really comforting yummy food in my cabinet really contributed to a binge addiction in 2019 for me i'm focusing now on simple meal 1 because i can't afford anything fancy or takeout right now and b i don't enjoy cooking and am too depressed don't otherwise have energy to sink into preparing a nice meal i think this in combination with the lack of packaged fake food ha really calmed down my so called glutton response every now and then i do some meal prep and create some very tasty complex keto dish some example are shirataki alfredo or paneer tikka masala however i found that eating these food completely triggered my glutton response on the day i made these meal for myself i would portion out enough for a whole work week but then eat it all in two day i just could not help myself with these more complex savory meal i would crave the flavor and the mouth feel so much that i literally could not stop myself from going back to the fridge for more in contrast if i eat a simple meal of lightly seasoned roasted or steamed veggie with some simply cooked chicken for example i would always be satisfied with the portion i originally set for myself the above 3 bullet point led me to realize that after all this time after the 17 lb i lost in 2021 and extreme self control i have exercised so far i still have an enormous psychological issue with food okay i know this wa pretty obvious in hindsight but i just couldn't define it well in my head maybe it's an addition to certain flavor or texture maybe it's trying to fill the emotional void i feel with delicious food but now that i realized that i'm going to avoid what i call complex meal highly seasoned and well textured until i can work with to figure out how to break the addiction i will begin to work with a therapist soon on these issue that being said i do treat myself with a small packaged keto brownie every day or other day if i can afford to get some that week but i make sure to get a bunch of one type at a time this way i get sick of having the same treat every single day and it reduces my urge to binge lol the last and what i think is most important point that i want to make is that it is so so so much easier to restrict calorie to a normal amount a opposed to bingeing thousand of calorie of fat when you are not tempting yourself with your addiction all the time cramming your face with fat all the time for sustained period is not the way to go like i did the first time sure the benefit of losing weight more quickly right now is great because i am eating balanced well keto balanced still eating that scoop of cream cheese at the end of everyday to get my fat macro in whole real food meal but i'm realizing this is just so much healthier i feel great i have energy i am happy with my weight loss but most importantly i believe now that i can transition from this to a sustainable permanent healthy lifestyle after i come off keto i have identified a major psychological issue that i am going to address which will help me sustain a new lifestyle after i hit my goal weight because let's be real life is better with carbs but i only deserve them if i can stop myself from out of control shoving them in my face and i believe i can achieve this next step and i think this is so important come up with an exit plan and permanent healthy maintainable lifestyle change for after i hit my weight goal let's be honest i love carbs this second round of keto ha made me realize that i can have a healthy lifestyle of enjoying carbs for the rest of my life and maintain the weight i want if i only address my binge eating issue i haven't come up with this plan yet but on my list is experimenting in the week and month after i exit keto to find out what my ideal maintain weight calorie macro are and factoring feeling good and having energy heavily into this aggressively working on my bingeing issue in talk therapy figuring out how to eat delicious food that i'm likely to binge without getting to that point fun and maintainable exercise a strength building routine and finding a type of cardio that i don't hate if you read all this thank you again sorry about the length and formatting organization i hope this help people regardless see picture of my progress and keto tracker here http imgur com a k1mex0m tl dr eat real whole food during keto don't cheat with fake sugar isolates rewarding occasionally is okay but be strict about how much you eat this will help you with portion control and listen to your body to actually know when to stop eating progress tracking chart are fun helpful and very motivational do some introspection and try to figure out your issue with food this helped me discover a huge psychological issue i have with bingeing food and i'm going to get help in therapy for it now now that i have discovered these thing i have so much hope that i can sustain a healthy diet after i hit my goal weight and enjoy carbs life in a healthy way

this on my own but i no longer believe that i can
